Title: The Robbery
Plot: Jerry is robbed after Kramer fails to close the apartment door. Elaine talks Jerry into looking at a fabulous apartment in the hopes that she can then have Jerry's place. Things are further complicated when George decides he wants the new place too.
GuestStars: David Blackwood, Anita Wise, James F. Dean, Kimberly Kates, Bradford English, Kimberley Kates, George Simms
